system.requirements:
Tier 2: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Ballistic Skill 40
Aptitudes: Willpower, Offence
system.effect: When attacking with a weapon that has the Flame Quality, the Sister can re-roll any results lower than their Willpower Bonus on damage rolls.

description.value: When attacking with a weapon that has the Flame Quality, the Sister can re-roll any results lower than their Willpower Bonus on damage rolls.
